languages.text: "Такое важное событие — визит Вольного Торговца! И такое отвратительное происшествие..."

traits.locale_text: "Такое важное событие — визит Вольного Торговца! И такое отвратительное происшествие..."

languages.text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."
languages.original_text: "Такое важное событие — визит Вольного Торговца! И такое отвратительное происшествие..."

traits.locale_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

"Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

languages.text: “如此重要的场合，行商浪人亲自造访，居然会被如此令人不快的意外所干扰……”
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: “如此重要的场合，行商浪人亲自造访，居然会被如此令人不快的意外所干扰……”

languages.text: «Una ocasión tan importante como la visita de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente empañada por un incidente tan desafortunado...».
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: «Una ocasión tan importante como la visita de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente empañada por un incidente tan desafortunado...».

languages.text: 「それほど重要な式典、自由開拓者の訪問が、そのような不快な事件で台無しにされるとは…」
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: 「それほど重要な式典、自由開拓者の訪問が、そのような不快な事件で台無しにされるとは…」

languages.text: "Ein derart wichtiger Anlass – der Besuch {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} – gestört von so einem unangenehmen Vorfall ..."
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: "Ein derart wichtiger Anlass – der Besuch {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} – gestört von so einem unangenehmen Vorfall ..."

languages.text: « Une occasion aussi importante que la visite d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, gâchée par un sordide incident... »
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: « Une occasion aussi importante que la visite d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, gâchée par un sordide incident... »

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in ziyareti gibi önemli bir olayın, böylesi tatsız bir gelişmeyle lekelendiğini düşündükçe..."
languages.original_text: "Such an important occasion — a visit from a Rogue Trader — marred by such an unpleasant incident..."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in ziyareti gibi önemli bir olayın, böylesi tatsız bir gelişmeyle lekelendiğini düşündükçe..."
